title: Every Blissful Moment
description: Non-shifting wolf Bliss Roberts imagined the most exciting thing in her future was her honeymoon with her three gorgeous hyena husbands.She never expected them to lost in the mountains on the way home and stumble upon a young owl shifter being forced to mate with a much older male. Stressed out by her own family's disfunction, Bliss loudly objects to the young girl's treatment. When the girl escapes, her people demand that Bliss and her three husbands take over the evening's entertainment, which includes having public sex so the owls can share in the pleasure.Memphis Gable and his brother Lincoln and Rome knew their wife was a spitfire with a wounded heart, but they didn't expect to have to defend her to a group of deadly owl shifters. To protect her, they'll have give the owls just a taste of the passion they share with their bride. When Bliss accidentally drinks too much of an aphrodisiac, the hyena clan's good intentions may be overwhelmed by her out of control lust. Can they keep a lid on their sweetheart's passion, or will the owls demand everything they have to give?It wouldn't be a hyena heat novel without scorching m/f/m/m sex, three males who would strip naked in a heartbeat to save their mate, and the sweet woman who has claimed their hearts. This book contains dangerous owl shifters who glow when they're turned on, a young woman in need of rescuing, mating, claiming, growled obscenities, and frequent use of the word 'mine'.
author: R.E. Butler
